sentences.en: A railway line crosses the park so children must not be allowed to stray.
sentences.cn: 有一条铁路横穿该公园，因此必须禁止小孩子在附近闲逛。

sentences.en: A stray dog came up to him.
sentences.cn: 一条野狗走近他。

sentences.en: An 8-year-old boy was killed by a stray bullet.
sentences.cn: 一名8岁男孩儿被流弹打死。

sentences.en: As for her personal safety, she said she isn't overly worried but does think about what a stray lunatic could do.
sentences.cn: 至于她个人的安全，她说她并没有过度担心，但是她的确在考虑一个流浪疯子可以做些什么。

sentences.en: Crews stray outside to film the view from the pavement.
sentences.cn: 工作人员移到人行道上拍摄这一景色。

sentences.en: Don't stray from the point.
sentences.cn: 不要离题乱扯.

sentences.en: Don't stray too far from the correct path.
sentences.cn: 不要离开正道太远了.

sentences.en: Every stray dog has to be taken by its finder to the police.
sentences.cn: 发现走失的狗后都应将它带到警察局。

sentences.en: He was wounded by a stray bullet.
sentences.cn: 他被流弹击伤.

sentences.en: One man was hit by a stray bullet and taken to hospital.
sentences.cn: 一名男子遭流弹击中，被送往医院。

sentences.en: Only two stray dogs benefited from all this confusion.
sentences.cn: 只有两只野狗从这场混乱中得到了好处.

sentences.en: Please don't stray from the subject.
sentences.cn: 请不要离开本题.

sentences.en: Reading from a tedious technical brief for hours on end, he would stray into difficult territory.
sentences.cn: 连续看上几个小时枯燥的技术简报后，他会不自觉地钻起牛角尖来。

sentences.en: She shrugged a stray lock of hair out of her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她把一缕散发从眼前甩开。

sentences.en: Stray mines began to turn up off the Pacific coast, imperilling commercial shipping.
sentences.cn: 散逸的水雷开始在太平洋海岸出现而危及商船的航行.

sentences.en: The dog was a stray which had been adopted.
sentences.cn: 这是条曾被收养的流浪狗。

sentences.en: Then let's say you get into horrible, disastrous debt and have to go begging to the government, like a sad little stray.
sentences.cn: 另外，比如说，你陷入了讨厌的、损失惨重的债务，而且必须像一个可怜的小流浪儿一样向政府祈求。

sentences.en: This will limit the number of stray dogs in the area.
sentences.cn: 这将会减少流浪狗在这一区域的数量。

sentences.en: Three of the soldiers strayed into enemy territory.
sentences.cn: 三名士兵误入敌军阵地。

sentences.en: Tourists often get lost and stray into dangerous areas.
sentences.cn: 旅游者们经常迷路走进一些危险区域。

sentences.en: We couldn't identify the stray child.
sentences.cn: 我们不能辨认出这个迷途孩子的身份.

words.tran_cn: 迷路者；流浪者；不走正路的人
迷路的；[动]离群的；偶遇的

phrases.tran_cn: 飞鸟集（泰戈尔著名诗集）
杂散电感；漏电感；分布电感
杂散辐射；杂散损射；漫辐射

trans.tran_cn: 独自的，零散的，（常指宠物）走失的，无主的，意外的
trans.tran_en: a stray animal, such as a dog or cat, is lost or has no home

trans.tran_cn: 走失的动物，离群者，迷路的孩子，不在原位置的东西
trans.tran_en: an animal that is lost or has no home
to move away from the place you should be

trans.tran_cn: 走失，偏离正题，走入歧途，（已婚者或有固定关系者）有外遇
trans.tran_en: to move away from the place you should be
